mapper.sql: id, mod_id, mod_name, rpt_name, rpt_path, rpt_file_name, para_num, proc_name, direction_flag, is_child_flag, para_str, menu_id, menu_code, remark, org_id, tenant_id, tenant_code, create_user_id, create_by, create_time, update_id, update_by, update_time, is_deleted, deleted_user_id, delete_user_name, delete_time
mapper.update: UPDATE reports SET is_deleted = 1 ,update_by = #{username}, update_time = now() WHERE id = ${id} AND is_deleted = 0
